title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go               Valley Forge Visitor Center   Your first stop when visiting the park.         Park Theater   Learn about the encampment from a 20-minute film.        The Muhlenberg Brigade Huts   Learn all about the soldier experience.              National Memorial Arch   A memorial to the sacrifices of the soldiers.        Artillery Park   Learn about the artillery units and General Knox.        Statues and Monuments   History, set in stone.
